lenders.name: Homayoun
lenders.loan_because: I decide to give my self best birthday gift, which was help the others, it is much easier to be giver then taker!

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: I want someone on the other side of the world to know that someone on this side of the world cares.

lenders.name: Christof
lenders.loan_because: There is no greater reward than to help someone need,
lenders.occupational_info: I write stories about mysterious people and fantastical places.  I add music, some special effects, and have actors read the stories aloud.  Then I put them on a website to share with people.

lenders.name: Lauren
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: Supporting development projects for USAID.

lenders.name: Joey N.
lenders.loan_because: hard working people deserve access to capital in order to invest in their livelihoods and build a better life for themselves and their family
lenders.occupational_info: I help foundations, charities, and social enterprises, and the people who fund them and run them make sure they follow the law

lenders.name: Kit
lenders.loan_because: I want to help the less fortunate and keep the poverty level down. It also feels good to give someone else an opportunity to progress to help themselves and their family.

lenders.name: Karen and Ron
lenders.loan_because: We are thankful to have been given the support that we needed to obtain an education, to work in professions that we love, and to make a difference.  Everyone deserves an opportunity to reach for their dreams and to succeed.  Through Kiva, we have a chance to give support to those who want to better themselves.

lenders.name: Josiah
lenders.loan_because: I have seen with my own eyes what a war-ravaged country looks like.
lenders.occupational_info: I was in the military and am now going to school. Some day I'd like to do more than just donate money.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.whereabouts: Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam and Tucson, AZ
lenders.loan_because: I can.  I have lived overseas since 1992 and feel the need to help others in many different ways.  Kiva is one small way that I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a volunteer and I teach adults how to work with girls for the Girl Scouting/Girl Guiding program.  I am an international trainer and travel worldwide for this work.  I currently live in Vietnam and train mostly in East Asia.  I also work with girls in Vietnam, teaching them life skills and how to plan things for themselves.

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I know what it is like to have a dream and want a better life for myself, my family, and my friends.  I loan because I can help to enable others dreams.

lenders.name: MessageMedia
lenders.occupation: SMS service provider for business and government
lenders.loan_because: MessageMedia aims to be more than just a business that provides a service. Our team feels strongly about lending a hand, and as a company we’ve embraced a range of initiatives that give something back to the community. We believe micro-finance organisations like Kiva provide solutions for lifting people out of poverty for the long term.
lenders.occupational_info:
MessageMedia is Australia’s largest provider of SMS solutions for business and government. We have offices in the US and UK, and over 9000 clients around the world.

www.messagemedia.com.au

www.message-media.com

www.messagemedia.co.uk

lenders.name: Susie & John
lenders.loan_because: It feels great to join in and be part of someone else's success and growth.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: I want to see good progress in the world and motivate myself to create more of it.  A little in the USA is a lot in the rest of the world.  How can I not?
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a small workshop that makes shelves and decorations and displays for retail stores that promote products.

lenders.name: Serdar
lenders.loan_because: We should care the people who needs support around the world, to make it a better place to live for all the of us. I believe, even small amounts will make huge difference for them, let us hepl each other!

lenders.name: Keith
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the spirit of entrepreneurship and the hidden power ingrained in the poor...all they need is a little encouragement.

lenders.name: Bou Lucia
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves to be productive

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: I have a disposable income and I want to help. I go to school, and work on the weekend. Here's hoping I'll be able to give others those opportunities. "I shall not live in vain."
lenders.occupational_info: I am an high school student at a good private school in Australia. I also work on my weekends at a local pharmacy. I'm lucky like that.

lenders.name: Cameron
lenders.loan_because: I love helping Entrepreneurs make their dreams happen.
lenders.occupational_info: I help entrepreneurs make their dreams happen.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: Giving is right.  Capitalism is good.  Freedom comes from both.
lenders.occupational_info: I search for people who commit fraud or cheat others and do my best to have them punished.

lenders.name: JRS
lenders.loan_because:
God wants each of us to be a blessing to others...
"For where your treasure is, there your heart will be also." ~ Matthew 6:21

lenders.name: steve laszczak
lenders.loan_because: I am able in a small way to help  people better themselves.

lenders.name: Kelly at Paper Stories
lenders.loan_because: as a small business owner in the arts, I understand the importance of funding to succeed.  I want to provide assistance to other small business owners so that they can have the same opportunities I have had.
lenders.occupational_info: Using an antique printing press, I create greeting cards and other forms of artwork on paper.    The printing press is a large machine that applies colored ink onto a raised surface that I have designed, and presses it into the surface of the paper.

lenders.name: Drew
lenders.loan_because: I think Kiva is the most direct and easiest way to reach across any distance to help our global brothers and sisters help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am graduate school at Forhdam University.

lenders.name: Sandy
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me with providing for all of my needs, and I would like to participate in His doing the same for others.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist a wonderful female pastor in her work, whether that be administratively, holding her up in prayer, or doing any one of a million miscellaneous things that she needs done so that she can serve her parishioners more powerfully.

lenders.name: Benjamin
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: boring.

lenders.name: Larry & Leslie
lenders.loan_because: because I have been a business man for 15 years and have always struggled to get loans.  I have been blessed with success and would like to see other endeavors succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I have been a commericial fisherman, I also charter fish and I own a small wood products manufacturing business.  I also teach wood shop at the local high school in the mornings.

lenders.name: Jenny
lenders.loan_because: My godmother introduced me to it by a gift certificate for my birthday. Thought it sounded like a really smart idea for helping others, and easy too!

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: It's one small way to make a difference in this big world.

lenders.name: Tori
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people make better lives for themselves by being self-sufficient and productive.
lenders.occupational_info: I furnish and decorate homes for re-sale.

lenders.name: Jai
lenders.loan_because: I believe that it is possible to create change without being wealthy.
lenders.occupational_info: I cook for people and write about cooking.

lenders.name: Charlie
lenders.loan_because: We all have the means to help

lenders.name: Jen
lenders.loan_because: Kiva empowers people who want to do good for themselves and their family.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: There is nothing better than individuals attempting to better their circumstances. Joining with others to help these individuals makes a beautiful, global community.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm currently studying History, Geography, and Economics in the university.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: it feels good

lenders.name: Sandi
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I work with disadvantaged children in Sihanoukville,  Cambodia, b enriching their lives through artistic expression through my  work with the NGO, CCPP

lenders.name: Pontus & Nilla
lenders.loan_because: We would like to help other people, especially women, to achieve their goals. We believe that a loan makes you feel more independent than charity.

lenders.name: Stu & Jill
lenders.loan_because: We belive, that given the chance, people can improve their lives.

lenders.name: Daphne
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: John and Nancy
lenders.loan_because:
A small amount can make a difference.  We also believe that prosperity leads to peace.  

Nancy adds: When I was in college and needed money, my adviser lent me $20 with one stipulation:  That in the future I would lend it to someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: We're both educators (John -- Career Development, Nancy -- Dance).  We are very involved in the arts and progressive political causes.  We have 6 cats who realize that our loans also help kitties in other countries.  They're on board.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I have more than I need. I want to share.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an account manager for a tech firm.

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: I want to do more good in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide reliable technology solutions that help small businesses perform.

lenders.name: The Hannah Montanas
lenders.loan_because: We have been studying economics, and learned about Kiva in a presentation from founder Jessica Flannery in a series on "Hope and Action." To end the year, we felt it was a good use of our money.

lenders.name: Tanita
lenders.loan_because: I believe children suffer the most as a result of poverty. If we can empower thier parents to make a change for the better, children around the world in turn get a chance - it's all about empowerment.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people/companies communicate about who they are and what they offer to a community and why they are different or better.

lenders.name: Torres Family
lenders.loan_because: People have helped me when I was in trouble. We are all human beings and we need each other.
lenders.occupational_info: I draw construction plans for Hospitals

lenders.name: Dave and JoeAnn
lenders.loan_because: We own a custom cabinet business and know what its like to get a small business going.
lenders.occupational_info: A cabinet builder for 40 years recently started our own business.

lenders.name: Harvey
lenders.loan_because: I have traveled over 9 years in the developing world. Instead of feeling horror at what my government is doing, I prefer to do something positive
lenders.occupational_info: I help care for animals that have been abandonded and abused,  eventually finding loving homes for them.

lenders.name: ACN - PPA Team
lenders.loan_because: We will provide the resources to equip entrepreneurs in developing nations with solutions that will enable them to realize the full potential of their businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: We provide innovative, high-performing solutions driven by the needs of our client.

lenders.name: Bob
lenders.occupation: Health Consultant, Instructor of Political Science
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of thinking about the world in terms of "we" instead of "I."
lenders.occupational_info: Instructor of political science at Everett Community College. I regularly show a video about KIVA when I discuss the "democratic ideal." I am also a health consultant for the State of WA Dept of Health.

lenders.name: CapWest
lenders.loan_because: CapWest believes anyone who has the dream and determination to better the lives of themselves, their family, and their community deserves a chance.
lenders.occupational_info:
CapWest Mortgage is a diversified bank dedicated to providing high quality loan products and services to its customers.

CapWest philosophies are paralleled with that of its parent, Farmers Bank & Trust, of Great Bend, Kansas; quality, honesty, integrity and ethics. A progressive national banking organization, Farmers Bank & Trust has strengthened customer confidence for over 100 years.

lenders.name: Moldovanu
lenders.loan_because: I required money, and have received them from the stranger
lenders.occupational_info: It is pleasant to Me to do interesting business, especially if for it pay money

lenders.name: Dart
lenders.loan_because: "If anyone has material possessions and sees his brother in need but has no pity on him, how can the love of God be in him? Dear children, let us not love with words or tongue but with actions and in truth." 1 John 3:17-18

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: a little assistance can enable people to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Tax adviser to UK and International business

lenders.name: Caleb
lenders.loan_because: Helping someone getting a better life is a legitimate cause.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Technology cordinator for an elementary school in Orlando Florida, US. I am  now working on a project called " High Speed Internet For Everyone". The project is conceived to make broadband internet available to developping countries and have it at a very low cost.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: God calls on us all to help however we can. Galations 2:20
lenders.occupational_info: I don't have much, but what I have, I want to share...

lenders.name: Stacy Fajardo
lenders.loan_because: no matter how much or how little we have, there is always enough to share.

lenders.name: Stan
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed and should share my good fortune.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: it is nice to see even a tiny amount or effort impacts the world and grows.

lenders.name: Karen-Marie
lenders.loan_because: I have the possibility to give!
lenders.occupational_info: When you are privileged enough to be able to do just about anything you want, I feel obligated to lend a helping hand to those who just need that little bit extra ...

lenders.name: Caroline
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do!

lenders.name: jojo
lenders.loan_because: i think i can be an instrument in making a positive change to someone

lenders.name: Sean and Barbara
lenders.loan_because: We're blessed so that we may bless others.  We're just a pipeline for God's love in a tangible form.

lenders.name: Liliana
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back! and help people
lenders.occupational_info:
Im an international student from Peru. Im currently studying business at University of West Florida in Pensacola, Florida. I know how people in my country struggle to get financing to run a business. That is the reason i want to help my people and people around the world. I just want to share 2 bible verses that teach me that we need to be generous givers
Luke 3:8a, 10-11 — “ ‘Produce fruit in keeping with repentance ...’ ... ‘What should we do then?’ the crowd asked. John answered, ‘The man with two tunics should share with him who has none, and the one who has food should do the same.’ ” 


Acts 20:35b — “[T]he Lord Jesus himself said: ‘It is more blessed to give than to receive.’ ”

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: With a small amount of money you can make a big difference
lenders.occupational_info: Our organization promotes collaboration and de-duplication of efforts to help serve homeless populations

lenders.name: Dana
lenders.loan_because: it is my honor to help someone in need because i have been fortunate to have strong family ties and friends that are there for me when i am in need.   I like to offer the same when I can.
lenders.occupational_info: i work for a well known cancer hospital - my job is helping the patients from a financial level and it is very rewarding.

lenders.name: Trudie
lenders.loan_because:
As you set out for Ithaka
hope your road is a long one,
full of adventure, full of discovery.
Laistrygonians, Cyclops,
angry Poseidon-don't be afraid of them:
you'll never find things like that on your way
as long as you keep your thoughts raised high,
as long as a rare excitement
stirs your spirit and your body.
Laistrygonians, Cyclops,
wild Poseidon-you won't encounter them
unless you bring them along inside your soul,
unless your soul sets them up in front of you. 


Hope your road is a long one.
May there be many summer mornings when, 
with what pleasure, what joy, 
you enter harbors you're seeing for the first time; 
may you stop at Phoenician trading stations 
to buy fine things, 
mother of pearl and coral, amber and ebony,
sensual perfume of every kind- 
as many sensual perfumes as you can; 
and may you visit many Egyptian cities 
to learn and go on learning from their scholars.


Keep Ithaka always in your mind. 
Arriving there is what you're destined for. 
But don't hurry the journey at all. 
Better if it lasts for years, 
so you're old by the time you reach the island,
wealthy with all you've gained on the way, 
not expecting Ithaka to make you rich. 
Ithaka gave you the marvelous journey. 
Without her you wouldn't have set out. 
She has nothing left to give you now. 


And if you find her poor, Ithaka won't have fooled you.
Wise as you will have become, so full of experience,
you'll have understood by then what these Ithakas mean. 

CP Cavafy

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.occupational_info: I help a team of people stay organized to solve technical problems and repair computers.

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.loan_because: I have been lucky in this life.I want to share with people who are trying hard to improve their lives. I have a special affinity for women because they are disadvantaged in many parts of the world based purely on their gender.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a health care provider for children. I evaluate ,diagnose and treat illnesses or maintain health by administering preventive health care.

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: I want to be an example for my daughter. I have more than I need and want to share it with others.

lenders.name: Jamie VanBuskirk
lenders.loan_because: I survived childhood without being struck down by malaria, diareha, AIDS or sporadic gun play so I'd say my life sucks a whole lot less that a lot of people's lives.  Plus it's great filler in boring conversations.  "Gee that's swell... Did I tell you I recently financed a Ugandan micro brewery and indirectly improved the lives of five extended families?  No?  Well listen up..."
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a faceless middle manager whose day to day toilings are of no global consequence what so ever.

lenders.name: Shermin
lenders.loan_because: I love the fact that a little goes a long way, and I can use the same money to do it again, and again, and again to help different people...
lenders.occupational_info: I follow Asian elephants as they go about their daily lives in Sri Lanka.  Right now I'm also trying to crowd-fund my research (see link).

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because: To make a difference

lenders.name: Uma
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to be able to help someone help themselves to accomplish their goals.

lenders.name: Svala
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a good idea.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a law office.

lenders.name: David
lenders.occupation: Retired Research Programmer and Antique Restorer
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed to have been born in the United States where I have had many opportunities to grow and prosper.  I want to share this prosperity  with others who were not so fortunate as I, but who just need a little help to find new opportunities for themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: For over 25 years I designed, installed, and maintained computer and network systems and programs at the University of Illinois.  Now I find vintage and antique clocks, radios, and phonographs which are broken, damaged, or abused, and restore them to the way they were when they were new.

lenders.name: Tabrel
lenders.loan_because: There have been times in my life I needed a loan and could not get one.

lenders.name: Barbara DiBiase
lenders.loan_because: It is imperative that those who can, do something to help create an equitable balance in the distribution of resources worldwide.
lenders.occupational_info: To asssit my town and those around us in discovering and implementing ways to use our resources in  more sustainable and efficient ways, so that the earth's limited capabilities are extended equitably for future generations.

lenders.name: Glenn
lenders.loan_because: Having been raised in a third world country, I'd like to leave a tiny footprint in this world by helping the less fortunate try to break out of their poverty cycle.
lenders.occupational_info: hard, ethical, honest and trustworthy worker

lenders.name: Le Newsletter
lenders.loan_because: We have lots of opportunity where I live, so when I can, I like to help people to succeed in places where there isn't as much opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: I write about other people's businesses in a way that helps them get new customers and make more money.

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.loan_because: I really want to see women in developing countries own and operate thriving small businesses in order for them to create happier, healthier lives for themselves and their children.
lenders.occupational_info: I run my own business helping individuals and businesses create cool, community-oriented websites.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: I have been fortunate in my life and would like to spread that luck.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a software engineer

lenders.name: Philip
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of contributing to something that so many say is not possible.  I see defaults every day from people with 1000 x the means of the average Kiva borrower and am inspired by people lifting them selves and their families up through focused self determination.
lenders.occupational_info: I do analysis and implement policy to help profitably grow the company I work for.

lenders.name: Monica
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance and I am fortunate enough to be able to help.

lenders.name: GS5
lenders.loan_because: We teach the kids of what we have and what we can do, of where others live and what they endeavor to do.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.occupation: Sustainability Communications for Green start up

lenders.name: Megan
lenders.loan_because: I'm able to. If I were ever unable or in need, I would hope that someone, somewhere would do the same for me.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a part-time student slowly working my way through school one latte at a time....

lenders.name: Lars
lenders.loan_because: I believe that sharing is the only way forward.
lenders.occupational_info: I design global computer networks

lenders.name: Lori
lenders.loan_because: Someone helped me when I needed it and I am paying that forward.

lenders.name: Andres & Family
lenders.loan_because: We want to help those who need help to move toward a better life.
lenders.occupational_info: Investment Professional with a wonderful wife and four beautiful children.  Veronica is my wife. Ariana, Isabela, Natalia and Matias are my children.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others succeed
lenders.occupational_info: Right now, I've re-entered school life to upgrade my job skills.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: We are all connected.
lenders.occupational_info: I write fiction about real injustices in the world to bring them to light in a way that everyone can relate to.

lenders.name: Kalle & Tove
lenders.loan_because:
We saw Nobel Peace price winner Prof. Muhammad Yunus on TV talking about micro-lending and how we all can contribute to help and support entrepreneurs to improve their life for themselves and reach their goals and dreams with loans from other people.

We decided to join Kiva and be a part of that group of people around the world who are willing to support entrepreneurs with a Small Loan that will enable that persons or that group to reach their goals and dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: Kalle works with Computers and IT and Tove works as a children's pre school teatcher.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: it's good to help other people.

lenders.name: audrey
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in women's lives in a volatile part of the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I buy houses, fix them up, and rent them.

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: I believe that all people deserve to live a happy productive life and be given the opportunity to provide a good standard of living for their families.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired from the Thames Valley District School Board

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: A wonderful way to help people help themselves and bring access to capital to people who might otherwise never have this opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm involved with managing money for sophisticated investors and those for whom capitalism has already worked very well.

lenders.name: Pat & Ana
lenders.loan_because: It feels good doing something for somebody else.

lenders.name: South County Girl
lenders.loan_because: We all need more humanity, grace, and love, --- not abundance, greed, arrogance, and pride
lenders.occupational_info: On a day to day basis I help run a gym and fitness center with tennis courts, a pool, and work out machines for my local city. I also lifeguard at the same place.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a school, with children between the ages of 11 and 14.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: Traveling the world I see poverty first hand and know my Kiva contribution can make a difference in thier lives.
lenders.occupational_info: Marine Officer  (Ship's Captain)

lenders.name: Lilika
lenders.loan_because: I looked at my life and realized how completely great it was. We can complain about the small things and these people don't get that luxury. Imagine that complaining can be a luxury! Sure, I don't live in a mansion with butlers and maids and have a lot of money; but why would you even spend money on something as useless as that when you can spend it to help someone else? We don't need all the things that we can have; definitely not. So whenever I look at something and say "hey, that's cool. I want it" I just think about all those people out there who need that money much more than me, and it cures my craving pretty quickly.

lenders.name: Nikita
lenders.loan_because: Entrepreneurship - not charity - is the answer to world poverty. With good ideas, motivation, hard work and possibility of financing with favourable terms anything is possible.

lenders.name: Bob
lenders.loan_because: I have been very lucky in life and I want to help others
lenders.occupational_info: Risk management - helping solve problems

lenders.name: Micah
lenders.loan_because: I work for a network of Christian MFI's, so I LOVE loaning to those clients that I have the privilege of serving on a daily basis.
lenders.occupational_info: I crunch numbers to help our MFI's run more effectively and efficiently.

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: I like to think of making a difference -- and sharing the connection, however transitory, with another person seeking to improve themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to achieve a sustainable healthy future for the human being and our relationship to our planet.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to fulfill there life potential!

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.occupation: Reiki practitioner and champion cookie baker
lenders.loan_because: I've been very blessed throughout the years.  I want to share hope, encouragement, and cash :-) with others who have dreams and plans for a better life.

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: To whom much is given, much is expected--Luke 12:48
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a caregiver, teacher, advocate, and friend of the sick...

lenders.name: Jake Martin
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people get established in their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage between 5 and 65 people depending on the stage of the film. I help with schedules, priorities, and decisions to get the shots done that make up a feature film.

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because: I want to empower people to lift themselves out of poverty

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: I'm interested in helping entrepreneurs in developing countries make a better life for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: My company provides loans to other companies to buy or build commercial real estate, such as office buildings and warehouses.

lenders.name: Aidan
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do

lenders.name: Gayle
lenders.loan_because: It's such an easy way to help people!
lenders.occupational_info: I analyze the way business processes work and identify any problems or inefficiencies.

lenders.name: Leslie
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back some of the help I received in hard times.

lenders.name: Marc
lenders.loan_because: Making just a small difference in someone's life is a good feeling
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a senior consultant in the computer field

lenders.name: Laurin

I wish good luck to all you entrepreneurs.
Laurin

lenders.name: Suzanne
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: Student

lenders.name: Greg Savoy
lenders.loan_because: I care.
lenders.occupational_info: I work hard to keep our employees safe and injury free.

lenders.name: Marie
lenders.loan_because: I'm so happy to be a part of this.  =)
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student now, so most of my work is fairly easy. Lots of reading and writing.

lenders.name: Sabina
lenders.loan_because: I like to see others succeed in what they love to do.  And I know my loans will also make a big difference in improving the lifestyle of others who just need a little helping hand.

lenders.name: Jenny
lenders.loan_because: . . . to know even one life has breathed easier because I have lived, this is to have succeeded.

lenders.name: mokum

lenders.occupational_info: Making money work.

lenders.name: Better Me, Inc
lenders.loan_because: We want to pay it forward.
lenders.occupational_info:
We improve communities, businesses and lifestyles one solution at a time.

For more details visit http://www.community.bettermeinc.net a place for socially responsible entrepreneurs.

lenders.name: David and Kim
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone willing to work should have the chance to borrow money to improve their living conditions.

lenders.name: Dirk, Jorji & Jarrah
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: People send me texts in English and I write them in German.

lenders.name: Kellaux
lenders.loan_because: Because we are fortunate enough to be able to... and we believe the old saying “Give a man a fish and feed him for a day... Teach a man to fish and feed him for a lifetime”
lenders.occupational_info: Our background is in global management consulting and we are now pursuing our own ventures with focuses on higher education and technology.

lenders.name: carolyn
lenders.loan_because: I believe i have a responsibilty to help people if I can
lenders.occupational_info: I clean peoples houses

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: I needed help and got it. Now I help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a writer. I also work at a car dealership in the parts department.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because:
the receiver may realize that hope and effort are worthwhile, even as they struggle. Without hope, there is little left. Without effort, hope doesn't really get you anywhere. 
Maybe my dollars will help them persevere. Persevere.Persevere.
lenders.occupational_info: I help my company with the legal aspects of its business, so the business side can focus on  helping patients receive their medical imaging results quickly and accurately through the use of technology.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: it is a way to help other people.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: It takes money to make money.  I'm hoping to help folks improve their way of life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a nurse.

lenders.name: Sara
lenders.loan_because: The inequality of riches on our planet seems insurmountable to me, but this is one way to make a tiny adjustment in the balance. I was born with so much and I constantly think about how much I have and how could I transfer some of what I have directly to people who need it. Kiva makes this so much more direct than donating to other aid agencies, though they have their place too.
lenders.occupational_info: I create training materials for people who are learning computer software to help them design buildings. I also write novels and poetry, but that doesn't make me very much money! I am also training to be a nurse, because that is what I really want to do.

lenders.name: Todd
lenders.loan_because: I have a very good life, and I want everyone to realize their life's potential.
lenders.occupational_info: I help sports teams create fun and profitable promotions for their fans and to attract new fans.

lenders.name: Candice
lenders.loan_because: I love reading about people's stories and helping them (a little) achieve their goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I interview people and read a lot in order to figure out how to make a website I work on better for our customers.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: I can and it is a good idea
lenders.occupational_info: Doing whatever I want, any old time

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: It's lovely! I'm honored to have the opportunity to turn a few bits of green paper into something meaningful.

lenders.name: LESLIE
lenders.loan_because: These folks work so hard just to provide for themselves and there loved ones.  As a self-employed person myself, I too work hard to provide. When such a small amount of money to us, can so significantly change the situation for someone else, how can you not give the person a hand up?
lenders.occupational_info: I help people secure financing to purchase a  home.

lenders.name: jwalant
lenders.loan_because:
Its my principal  to donate 5% of my monthly income to the one in real need of money.
And KIVA makes the perfect partner to achieve this goal.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a construction company, as a project manager, who is an administrator and manager for  construction work in new york.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: Through Kiva, my loan is more 'real' - I / you can see the result of the loan evolving over time, making a difference to the lives it touches.

lenders.name: Marion
lenders.loan_because: I believe that helping people directly is the best way to improve the lot of the world.

lenders.name: Asha
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping all my relations create food to live in joy.

lenders.name: Natalie
lenders.loan_because: We're all neighbors.

lenders.name: Iftekhar
lenders.loan_because: people who have the ideas and the drive should have the funds to sustain themselves.

lenders.occupation: Executive Assistant to Vice President PRODUCTION
lenders.loan_because: it makes my heart smile.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the largest newspaper company in the United States of America.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I like to be able to make a difference even if it is only a small amount.

lenders.name: ukachi

lenders.occupational_info: I work with making organisations work better and smarter through increasing the general work health balance.

lenders.name: Avi Butbul
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: M & J
lenders.loan_because: There is always someone less fortunate than yourself who could greatly benefit from a small part of what you can offer.

lenders.name: Olga and Kris

Zuerst kommt das Fressen, dann die Moral. (First comes eat, than the moral.)

lenders.name: The Links San Diego, CA Chapter

lenders.name: Suzanne
lenders.loan_because: Kiva seems an excellent platform from which to learn more about how microfinance works
lenders.occupational_info: I help people sort out their legal problems.

lenders.occupational_info: I sell cleaning products that are environmentally friendly.  The company is called METHOD and we are blessed to have much success the last few years.  They provide me with a nice income and life!

lenders.loan_because: Passing on God's love.

lenders.name: Shawn
lenders.loan_because: it's a wonderful thing to do...help others help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an anesthesiologist who works to support his travel habits!

lenders.occupational_info: MTS Allstream is currently the 3rd largest telecommunications company in Canada.  This lending group is made up of Employees in the Consumer division in Winnipeg, Manitoba, Canada.

lenders.name: Monica et Matthieu
lenders.loan_because: it's nice to see people with hope

lenders.name: Mike and Jenn
lenders.loan_because: it is a safer investment than our mortgage right now! oh, and it seems like a brilliant idea.
lenders.occupational_info: i work at a university focusing on environmental issues, specifically restoring streams and rivers. My wife is in management but is working to become a social worker.

Ray: Marketing/Business Consulting

lenders.occupational_info: I save lives - okay, not really.  But I work at a hospital that does save lives, and I help manage the employee issues (human resources).

lenders.name: Mikhail and Oksana

lenders.loan_because: Compared to the entrepreneurs, I have so much and they have so little of everything except courage

lenders.name: Dd R
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Lana
lenders.loan_because: I believe that it is giving back blessings that God has bestowed upon me and my family.  I owe God everything, therefore I give something.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people with legal issues and act as their assistant.  Through the attorneys I work for we seek justice on their behalf.  I also speak to women in jail and enourage them to follow God's plan for their life.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: It is a way to give others the same opportunity that I have had.
lenders.occupational_info: I make products that clean water.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: I believe that we are all one and what we do for each other makes a difference for us all.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a jewelry artist. I design, produce and sell my own work at shows around the Midwest of the United States.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: I have been helped by others in the past when I needed it so it is my honor and obligation to do the same.
lenders.occupational_info: I empower people to become the best they can be.

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: I cried when I first heard about Kiva.  I don't cry when I'm sad, I cry when things touch my soul.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people find time for themselves in their busy lives.

lenders.name: Lynn
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed and I believe in sharing your blessings with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I generate & adjust the billing for a large utility company in the Midwest of North America.

lenders.name: brett
lenders.loan_because: In my travels to the third world I have met hundreds of motivated people that lack the funds to get started. This is an amazing concept that will empower the less fortunate not through a handout but by mutual respect.
lenders.occupational_info: I create websites.

lenders.name: Leslie
lenders.loan_because:
I like supporting entrepreneurs, especially women entrepreneurs! 

"If you've come to help me, you're wasting my time, but if you've come because your liberation is bound up with mine, lets work together." -Lilla Watson
lenders.occupational_info: I work for STR Responsible Sourcing. We assist major US and European retailers ensure that the labor conditions of the factories they source from are adequate.

lenders.name: Emily
Marcelle
lenders.loan_because: There are people in need and, through loans like Kiva organises, we can help them.

lenders.name: Paulo
lenders.loan_because: I wanna buy a instrument. It's make just in Ireland. It's tin whistle. I need $30 for buy this instrument.

lenders.name: Tom & Linda
lenders.loan_because: The whole world can benefit from one small gesture.

lenders.name: Prashanth
lenders.loan_because: To give a chance for someone to better their life.

lenders.name: Dorothy
lenders.occupation: Work for a clothing store, Ross Stores
lenders.loan_because: My 14 yr old grandson loaned first and taught us all how much we could help others and make a difference to this world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a big office with hundreds of others who support nearly 900 clothing stores across the US, called Ross Stores.  My job is to manage a group of 50 employees who pay all of the bills associated with our stores, offices and warehouses.

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur as well and like to help fellow entrepreneurs.

lenders.name: Steve & Kami
lenders.loan_because: God has given us so much, the least we could do is to help another.  We still believe that each of us making small changes can add up to big change.  We dream of a future where poverty and hunger are no more.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: God has done amazing things in my life, and I want others to feel His presence in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I want to glorify God in all that I do.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I have what I need and want to help others help themselves.

lenders.name: Valerie
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me with so much - I want to show my appreciation by blessing others less fortunate than myself.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a full time mother and homemaker, and a member of the P.E.O. sisterhood

lenders.name: Kenan
lenders.loan_because: I believe it makes a difference.

lenders.name: Jami
lenders.loan_because: There are needs that I can help with.
lenders.occupational_info: Love and teach children

lenders.name: Hamid Schricker

lenders.name: Symantec Aspire SW
lenders.loan_because: As part of the Symantec Aspire mentor program, I believe giving and receiving is part of the process to enable growth
lenders.occupational_info:
We protect more people from more
online threats than anyone in the world

lenders.name: Nikitas
lenders.loan_because: Resources have the most positive impact when they're in constant motion.  By American standards, I'm far from wealthy; but I've been fortunate in my life, and if I could share but a small portion of that to make an impact in even just one other person's life -- then I've made a difference... in BOTH of our lives.

lenders.name: Naninhos
lenders.loan_because: We are from South America and we want to share with people in need.

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: in a blink of an eye life can change for the better and if you can help somebody accomplish his/her goals all the better!
lenders.occupational_info: Lots of paperwork.

lenders.name: K&K
lenders.loan_because: We have travelled throughout the world and feel it's now time to give something back and help others to help themselves, in a way which doesn't create or perpetuate dependence on others.

lenders.name: jonathan
lenders.loan_because: i want to give others an opportunity to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: i am a medical student and student of life.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I am so fortunate to be able to do what I love, and I think all people deserve the opportunity to pursue their own dreams.

lenders.name: Jesse
lenders.occupation: Communication Artist, Not For ProfitBusiness Owner

lenders.name: Srikanth
lenders.loan_because: I believe in Social Justice can be brought through compassionate capitalism.

lenders.name: Shinae
lenders.loan_because:
I have been very blessed. God has provided me with everything I need to become the person he intended. I now get to share in his delight as he works through me to do the same for others in need.  
"The people curse him who holds back grain (when the public needs it), but a blessing (from God and man) is upon the head of him who sells it. He who diligently seeks good seeks (God's) favor." Proverbs 11:26-27
I loan because the Father wants to provide for all his children, and he wants us to be able to share in his joy of doing so by letting us help!
Sounds like a pretty good deal to me.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a business student studying Finance and Spanish.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: I hope to make a difference in somebody else life.  and to show other people that I care
lenders.occupational_info: I work with young boys that have been abused physically and mentally

lenders.name: Jolene
lenders.loan_because: I think it is a wonderful opportunity to be able to give someone a helping hand that will enable them to build/expand their business and create a better future for themselves and their family.
lenders.occupational_info: We build custom homes.

lenders.name: Tor Benestad
lenders.loan_because: I believe small businesses are the backbone of every community.

lenders.name: Mandava
lenders.loan_because: I trade in hope.

lenders.name: Williams Family
lenders.loan_because:
“You are the light of the world. A city on a hill cannot be hidden. Neither do people light a lamp and put it under a bowl. Instead they put it on its stand, and it gives light to everyone in the house. In the same way, let your light shine before others, that they may see your good deeds and glorify your Father in heaven.

-- Matthew 5:14 - 16

lenders.name: Ackermann

lenders.loan_because: I can!

lenders.name: Mikkel
lenders.loan_because: I can, and because I want to help others feel good about themselves. Being able to pay back a loan gives you a great self confidence.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping other businesses focus on their core skills and outsource non core activities to my employer.

lenders.name: Davide
lenders.loan_because: Anybody who is full of good intentions has to have the chance to improve his life with no additional fees.
lenders.occupational_info: I make some boxes do their work properly.

lenders.occupational_info: Middle School Student at JN Fries

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I have traveled to 31 countries and I understand the need for projects like this.  In my life I have been lucky, and want to give back to the people that are like the people I have met in my travels.  Hard working entrepreneurs that seek the same opportunities that I am fortunate enough to have.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the financial system , commonly known as Wall Street.  The people I work with are far removed from projects like this, but if more knew about it I think could make a meaningful difference to the global community.   I choose to make this a part of my work.

lenders.name: Jim & Nancy
lenders.loan_because:
We are always looking for ways to help with what God has blessed us with.
Kiva has provided the opportunity to connect with people around the world in an uplifting way. Thanks Kiva
lenders.occupational_info: Retired

lenders.name: Elisabete Miranda
lenders.loan_because:
I believe that a small amount of money can help a lot.
I believe in people's capacities to make good things happen.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm current an Information Unit Manager in a Bank at Mozambique. I was a business analyst in a portuguese bank. I've worked 17 years with computers and I was a teacher at University.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: the cause is good and the need is great.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm learning how to describe the workings of the universe.  I also love waffles.

lenders.name: Mary & Doug Snyder
lenders.loan_because: There is a need and, to quote Margaret Mead, "Never doubt that a group of thoughtful, committed citizens can change the world.  Indeed, it is the only thing that ever has."  May these ladies, and those like us who provide loans make the changes that we all so desperately need.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I own a used record store and provide quality music of all kinds to many different types of folks.  I also work at Yale University as a financial assistant.

lenders.name: lisa
lenders.loan_because: I feel lucky and blessed and would like to help someone else achieve their dreams and provide for their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mother of three children-2 boys (ages 14 and 8) and 1 girl (age 12).  I work at SarahCare part time, and do data entry work nights and weekends.  I want to spend as much time with my children as possible while still bringing in extra income.  I have an elementary education degree which I may use again one day.

lenders.name: Zerrin
lenders.loan_because: I believe that the greatest gift you can recieve is the ability to give

lenders.occupational_info:
Esther Boucicault Stanislas is the firts lady in Haiti who declared her seropositivity in radio station and television.She created " The Fondation Esther B. Stanislas" , at Saint Marc Haiti,since 1996.We are working in the field of the Psychosociale Assistance,Medicale Assistance and nutritional support with people living with the HIV / AIDS.
